00037 #include "RegularStimulus.hpp"
00038 #include <cmath>
00039 #include <cassert>
00040 
00041 #include <iostream>
00042 
00043 RegularStimulus::RegularStimulus(double magnitudeOfStimulus, double duration, double period, double startTime, double stopTime)
00044 {
00045     assert(period > 0);
00046     assert(period >= duration);
00047 
00048     mMagnitudeOfStimulus = magnitudeOfStimulus;
00049     mDuration = duration;
00050     mPeriod = period;
00051     mStartTime = startTime;
00052     mStopTime = stopTime;
00053 
00054     //Swell duration to avoid rounding issues
00055     mDuration += period*DBL_EPSILON;
00056 }
00057 
00058 double RegularStimulus::GetStimulus(double time)
00059 {
00060     /*
00061      * This covers a borderline case where start time is larger than period
00062      * and period divides start time, e.g. start_time=2 period=1.
00063      *
00064      * fmod() will return -0 in this case and will therefore switch the stimulus on.
00065      */
00066     if (time < mStartTime)
00067     {
00068         return 0.0;
00069     }
00070 
00071     double beatTime = fmod(time-mStartTime, mPeriod);
00072 
00073     if (beatTime >=0 && beatTime <= mDuration && time <= mStopTime)
00074     {
00075         return mMagnitudeOfStimulus;
00076     }
00077     else
00078     {
00079         return 0.0;
00080     }
00081 }
00082 
00083 double RegularStimulus::GetPeriod()
00084 {
00085     return mPeriod;
00086 }
00087 
00088 double RegularStimulus::GetMagnitude()
00089 {
00090     return mMagnitudeOfStimulus;
00091 }
00092 
00093 double RegularStimulus::GetDuration()
00094 {
00095     return mDuration;
00096 }
00097 
00098 double RegularStimulus::GetStartTime()
00099 {
00100     return mStartTime;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void RegularStimulus::SetMagnitude(double magnitude)
00104 {
00105     mMagnitudeOfStimulus = magnitude;
00106 }
00107

00109 {
00110     mPeriod = period;
00111 }

00114 {
00115     mDuration = duration;
00116 }

00119 {
00120     mStartTime = startTime;
00121 }
00122 
00123 void RegularStimulus::SetStopTime(double stopTime)
00124 {
00125     mStopTime = stopTime;
00126 }
